New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers extended their franchise-best winning streak to 15 games.
They are the fourth team in NBA history to begin a season 15-0.
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley put up 23 points and 11 rebounds.
Jarrett Allen added 21 points and 15 rebounds.
Georges Niang contributed 13 points off the bench.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers held a 72-59 halftime lead.
Because of that high percentage and 12-for-12 free-throw shooting, the Cavaliers secured only one offensive rebound in the half.
